Summary: A light like a very bright star flew over the house ,stopped pattern across the sky satalite quick stopped
divs: Sighting DetailsI came out on my back deck. I looked up st the sky on the clear night to look at the stars. The light came over the roof of my house, heading east to west. It was extremely bright, and that is what caught my attention. I have seen the space station, and I thought that was what I was seeing. Then it stopped moving, moved to the left, then moved to the right,. I went into my house to get my man to come and see. When he came out it made a curve pattern, paused than shot off.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
